page.title: 19A SENIOR CITIZENS DAY.
page.content: 7.30 a.m. the cat is pawing my face, telling me its time to get up, feed cat, make a cup of tea and watch Breakfast Time T.V. while drinking it. Shower, dress, breakfast (toast and marmalade), attend to routine chores. Catch the bus (which runs once a week) to local market town using free travel tokens. After shopping meet up with other senior citizens for a cup of coffee and a chat. Home to a light lunch of cheese sandwich and fruit. Weather suitable for an afternoons gardening. Welcome a break when a neighbour drops in for a chat. Time for evening meal (chop, two veg. apple pie with yogurt), watch evening news on T.V. while eating meal. No outside activies this evening so settle down with some craft work or a library book Check time of evenings instalment of favourite "soap opera". 10.30p.m. bed!
